column4: can somebody please help me im getting like 100 mails locally from the Cron Daemon everyday :( the mail looks like this http://pastebin.com/508564  please help me remove this :)
sorry I don't know anything about your problem, but how do you check your mail?  Do you have to setup a server?
theese emails is sent to my ubuntu user
I see, how do you set that up?  If you have a keyword I could search or a link, that's all I'm looking for :)
i just think i some months ago tried to add something to crontab that got wrong and now the cron deamon sends theese mails becauce the think i tried to add does not work.
i havent done anything with mail i just use "mail" with standard configuration locally
well while you wait for someone that knows more... have you tried reading pg-microsites-installer.php, or does that file not exist anywhere?
'locate microsites' turn up anything you can read?  after that I would search all the cron stuff for a mention of microsites
dont find anything, how do i list daily crontab stuff?
do 'locate cron' and see if any of that stuff mentions microsites, I don't know exactly how ubuntu uses it.  i've only started reading about cron recently
what is the filesystem type and have you set it up in fstab?
